item.description: This a casual get together for drinks and also a chance to talk about what members would like to do for upcoming events. No cost, just pay for your own drink or appetizer. No pressure, just bring a smile and have fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Our group will be to the right of the bar. If you need help finding our group, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.why: This a relaxed and fun group with one simple purpose- to bring Metro West professionals in their twenties and thirties together to hang out and enjoy life.
item.name: Meet up for drinks and good times
